features: Thie Ritz Camera Kit Features The Kodak 145 1855 Professional Portra 800 Color Negative Film (ISO 800) 35mm 36 Exposures
all the advantages of a fast film with a fineness of grain that is unsurpassed in its class; ideal for long lenses, high action, and low light
Captures even background nuances in low light situations
Push to 1600 when you need extra speed
description: Included in this Ritz Camera Bundle: &dams; 1) Kodak 145 1855 Professional Portray 800 Color Negative Film (ISO 800) 35mm 36 Exposures Pack of 2 all the advantages of a fast film with a fineness of grain that is unsurpassed in its class; ideal for long lenses, high action, and low light Captures even background nuances in low light situations Push to 1600 when you need extra speed Kodak Professional Portray 800 is a color print film with an ISO of 800 which is fast enough to catch the action in difficult lighting situations, often without on-camera flash. The grain is now even finer than ever before. And the extra speed allows you to pick up more detail in the foreground and background, even in low light.
